3. Gemini - 8/10 - Gemini is a curious and adaptable sign that thrives on variety, but may struggle with commitment.
4. Cancer - 9/10 - Cancer is an empathetic and nurturing sign that values family and home, but may be overly sensitive.

6. Virgo - 8/10 - Virgo is a hardworking and analytical sign that values perfection, but may be too critical.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Libra is a charming and diplomatic sign that seeks balance, but may struggle with indecision.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Scorpio is a passionate and intense sign that probes deep truths, but may be overly suspicious.
9. Sagittarius - 9/10 - Sagittarius is an adventurous and optimistic sign that loves exploration, but may be too blunt.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Capricorn is a disciplined and ambitious sign that values structure, but may struggle with emotional expression.

12. Pisces - 9/10 - Pisces is a compassionate and imaginative sign that floats on intuition, but may be too dreamy.
